name: Beer Baron
description:
Welcome to Beer Baron!

In this round based game you found your own beer brewing company.  As a new owner of a beer company you have a lot to do:

- buy ingredients as cheap as possible

-find the perfect recipe

-try new recipes

-control the advertisement

-control the comply with selling contracts

and of course: control the finances to make sure you earn money!

System requirements
  • Windows 7 or newer
  • 200 MB of free RAM available on the system
  • 60 MB of free disk space
  • OpenGLES 3 compatible GPU (older Intel Graphics will not work)

Install instructions

If you download the game as a zip file, just extract it and run the file BeerBaron.exe. You can also use the Itch app instead.
